rules_text:
Trample, prowess
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wurmboil Engine: You gain 3 life.
When Wurmboil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Food Wurm artifact creature token with trample and a 3/3 colorless Food Wurm artifact creature token with prowess. Each of those tokens also has “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: You gain 3 life.”
